
/!\ Please read the following guidelines before making any changes to the Vendor folder. /!\

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Do not add, delete, or modify any file in the Vendor folder. 
  The content of the Vendor folder is maintained by Agileo Automation and it can be overwritten by a more
  advanced version.

- It is possible not to use a file contained in XamlResources folder by commenting the associated line in
  App.xaml.

- If you wanted to make a change to any of the files provided, you had to duplicate or inherit it outside
  of the Vendor folder and replace the references of the old file with the new one.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
